https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.short_instructions: This is Laurel the Adventurer!  Can you move her around and get treasure?
https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.long_instructions:
**Free Play:** This is Laurel the Adventurer! Move her around and get as much treasure as you can.

Drag blocks into the workspace and try to figure out how to get treasure.  Get at least one item to pass this level.

authored_hints.courseB_collector_loops1_a: The [blockly block][0] block can be used to pick up treasure when you are standing on top of it.

callouts.courseB_collector_loops1_1: Do you see some new blocks in the toolbox?  Don't worry, we will show you how to use them later in the stage.

Get all four piles to pass this level.

authored_hints.courseB_collector_loops2_a: You'll have to move before you can collect any treasure.

https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.short_instructions: This is a new type of puzzle called "Artist". Play with the level and draw something fun.
The Artist is trying to draw a line **6** times, but can't get it right.  Can you help?

authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops2_a: If you want the loop to repeat more than 4 times, you can change the number at the top of the block.
authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops2_b: Try running the code first to see where the artist ends up.

https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.short_instructions: Help the artist draw a line 7 times to make a garden wall.

authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops3_a: Remember to use a `repeat` loop for better code!
authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops3_b: The artist will want to move South to draw this line.

callouts.courseB_artist_loops3_1: There is only one of these blocks in the toolbox.  How will you use it?

authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops4_a: The jump block lets you move forward without drawing a line.
authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops4_b: You will need to add a block inside of the repeat loop to solve this puzzle.
authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops4_c: Don't forget to change the number of times the loop repeats.

https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.short_instructions: Time to fix the stairs!  Repeat this pattern **5** times so the artist can reach the top of the bushes.

authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops5_a: Drag out a `repeat` loop, then put the other blocks inside of it. How many times do you need to repeat?

callouts.courseB_artist_loops5_1: This number means that there are no more of this block left in the toolbox.

authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops7_a: This challenge uses **4** loops, one right after another!
authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops7_b:
Notice that every loop makes a stair pattern that goes a different direction.

[][0]
authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops7_c:
The loops should do this:

-   Loop 1
    -   Right
    -   Down

-   Loop 2
    -   Right
    -   Up

-   Loop 3
    -   Left
    -   Up

-   Loop 4
    -   Left
    -   Down

https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.short_instructions: Time to head home. Can you fix this ladder using only one block to help the artist get down?

authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops8_a: How many times should you repeat the pattern to make the ladder?
authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops8_b: Try running the code you're given to see what it does.

authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops9_b: You will want to use the W block to solve this puzzle.
authored_hints.courseB_artist_loops9_c: Can't figure out where to put the loop? Try writing the code step-by-step and look for a pattern.

https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.short_instructions: Use your imagination. What can you do to make this game more fun?
Make the animals move down when you press ▼.
https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.long_instructions:
It's time for the Great Animal Race! Make the animals move down when you press `▼`. 

Who will run the fastest?

https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.short_instructions: Make the animals disappear when you click on them.
https://studio.code.org/s/courseb-2017/s.long_instructions:
Let's make the animals disappear when you click on them.
Try playing with the dog now, then help the other animals join in the fun. You can also add sounds and score points to create a game of Animal Tag!

authored_hints.courseB_playlab_events_challenge2_a: Each animal in the game should disappear when clicked. It should also come back after a second or two!
authored_hints.courseB_playlab_events_challenge2_b:
Use other event blocks to make the other animals disappear!

[blockly block][0]
authored_hints.courseB_playlab_events_challenge2_c:
Use extra commands to play sounds or score points when you click the animals!

authored_hints.courseB_playlab_events_challenge2_d:
Mix it up!

Make some animals give more points than others.
Use different sounds.
Change the animals' moods!
